content: न्यून {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Lessened, diminished, shortened. {@--2@} Defective, inferior, deficient, wanting, destitute of; as in अर्थन्यून. {@--3@} Less (<ab>opp.</ab> अधिक); <ls>Y. 2. 116.</ls> {@--4@} Defective (in some organ); पाद°. {@--5@} Low, wicked, vile, despicable. --नं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Less, in a less degree.
